content:
Is anyone aware of this and working to resolve? Multiple PRs are failing with the same error below.
For example, https://dev.azure.com/fhir-build/build.fhir.org/_build/results?buildId=1886,

##[Error 1]
The agent: agent-01 lost communication with the server. Verify the machine is running and has a healthy network connection. For more information, see: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=846610
<bump> @Lloyd McKenzie @Grahame Grieve I have PRs that all got "stuck" this weekend due to the communication error above. What are the next steps to get these PR checks completed and PRs merged?
I have a PR that seems to be hanging. No error but not successful either. Any ideas?
Thanks for the mention here -- looking into it!
I hit rebuild on 522 and 523; looks like they're making progress, but we'll see what happens. I'm not sure why 524 and 525 aren't building; redelivering the webhook didn't seem to help.
oh, it did... just slowly. 524 is rebuilding now too.
Thanks @James Agnew 525 still hasn't built.
@Melva Peters did you mean to tag me, or Josh?
I'm not sure what happened to 525, but I closed it and created 526 in its place because I'm not able to debug right now. Please do continue to @mention me if you see any issues.
@Josh Mandel worked this time. Thanks
